Message.Title: EBAY ALLOWS LOW FEEDBACK BUYERS TO DESTROY ESTABLISHED BUSINESSES
Message.Msg: It is ridiculous for Ebay to allow a zero or low feedback customer to leave malicious feedback for an established powerseller. There needs to be a feedback interview process or at least some restrictions on who or what type of feedback can be left. If the customer received the product they ordered on time, THEN THAT'S IT!....They should not be allowed to leave a negative feedback because they didn't like the tone of an e-mail response. C'MON EBAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
